attributes.action: Declare the Brexit referendum null and void.
attributes.additional_details: For all the reasons listed above. The false claims mad by 'leave' were no more than a con job. Leaving the EU has cost us billions and expatiated the illegal immigrant problem.
attributes.background: This vote was based on lies and deceit perpetuated by the 'leave' campaign. Moreover, there is strong evidence there was a great deal of illicit finance involved - eg Russia, Untaxed off shore account money belonging to big businesses. Therefore it was a completely false result.

rejection.details: Unclear who is to do this and what effect the petitioner expects it would have in practice
